title: Inquiry About Time-of-Use (TOU) Rates
description: A customer wants to understand how Time-of-Use (TOU) electricity rates work and if they would be a good fit.

tasks.description: Explain the concept of TOU rates, including the different peak, off-peak, and shoulder periods and prices.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the structure of TOU rates.

tasks.description: Analyze the customer's hourly usage data to show them what percentage of their energy is used during peak times.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a personalized analysis of the customer's usage patterns.

tasks.description: Simulate their last bill on the TOU rate to estimate potential savings or costs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a bill comparison to help the customer make an informed decision.
